segue_the_chain: Jazz Thing mentions Ornette Coleman, whose 1961 album Free Jazz: A Collective Improvisation features a Jackson Pollock painting. So to Jackson by Johnny Cash, which we’ve had, so to…

segue_dave.line: Gang Starr started being a band in 1985, while God Damn's "Horus" was released by One Little Indian Records, a record label which was founded in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Gang Starr started being a band in 1985 and God Damn's "Horus" was released by One Little Indian Records, a record label which was founded in the same year.
